title: Album Page, "Gate at Laon", May 30, 1887
medium: Graphite on off-white wove paper tipped into binding with fabric
inscribed: Recto, in graphite, bottom right of drawing: Gate at Loan [sic] / May 31 1887; at upper right corner: 3; at lower left corner: 1.
description: Vertical sheet depicting a large masonry building with turret supported by a buttress on its right side. The building seems to be late medieval or early Renaissance with it stall pitched tiled roof.  Visible at the rear of the building is an arched opening through which passes a walkway.  This area is lined by a railing.

tombstone.epitaph:
Album Page, "Gate at Laon", May 30, 1887.
May 30, 1887. Graphite on off-white wove paper tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-177.
